duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, implement and supervise the company’s financial processes.
Works closely with the CAO & CFO to manage $40MM construction loan funds.
Assist the CAO in building out financial processes and the financial team.
Manage the company’s financial accounts, payrolls, budgets, cash receipts and financial assets.
Handle the company’s daily transactions and debts.
Reconcile accounting records on a daily, monthly and annual basis.
Assists with cash flow management, data analysis, and cost accounting.
Understands and maintains knowledge of GAAP accounting practices and procedures.
Performs other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or equivalent
